Description:
We have a vision larger than the ocean: to be a true integrator of container logistics connecting and simplifying our customers’ supply chain. We count on our people to make it happen.
We’re taking a big step on this journey: building one global HR organization. Carrying out a vital mission: support our employees, so they can best support our customers.
As an LCL Growth & Enablement, you’ll play a vital part in our success. You’ll participate in identifying and developing projects/business opportunities within the area of responsibility. Ensures that local (responsible geography) market awareness and presence are established, making first contact with potential clients and partners where appropriate. You´ll be the product experts guiding and supporting sales in opportunity targeting and development.We OfferKey ResponsibilitiesWe are looking forJob Details
